release.problem: Creating new projects failed because of reference to signed assemblies.

release.change: GitHub release. Removed third party libraries and License checking.

release.feature: ApkSpy reads JAR or APK archive to open, from command line.
release.problem: System.BitConverter did not respect endianess.
Improved number formatting by System.String.Format.
Unsubscribing from event failed.
Improved importing JAR (several issues).
Android Manifest template referenced the wrong assembly version.

release.feature: Added support for AndroidManifest.xml.
release.change: Improved unknown serial message.

release.feature: Added support the Android 4.4 (KitKat) API.
Added OpenGL 20 Basic sample (ported from Android SDK)
Save framework version and certificate settings for "New project" as user preferences.
Added copy to clipboard function to Device Log.
release.change: All primitive static readonly fields (Java) are now converted to const (C#).
Improved not-activated message.
Free Apps key no longer required for publishing.
release.problem: Layout of activation dialog messed up.
Exception.StackTrace has incorrect type (should be string).

release.feature: Added CancellationToken support to async.
Added refresh function to Device center.
Added copy to clipboard function to Assembly Checker.
Added "Import 'res' folder" to VisualStudio to import resources in Android (folder structure) format to dot42 (filename) format.
release.change: Activation is started directly from installer.
Removed support for creating/editing emulator images.
Replaced Device connection wizard with online help.
Various UI improvements.
AtomicInteger/AtomicLong had a few incorrect properties (AndIncrement/AndIncrement). These have been removed.
release.problem: DateTime.ToString/ToShortDateString had several issues.
Add JAR reference missing from Visual Studio.
Async can fail on single CPU systems.
Nested interface constants classes can be non-visible (e.g. ContactsContract.ISyncColumnsConstants).
Nested try/catch blocks with catch(object) yield incorrect catch blocks.
Some local variables do not appear in Locals window due to register spilling.

release.feature: async/await support.
PropertyInfo support.
release.change: Installer name changed to dot42AndroidSetup.
Improved enum performance.
release.problem: Added types missing from .NET framework forward assemblies.
release.change: Improved XDocument (fixed errors, improved API).
release.problem: Lot's of compiler issues. Many struct and generics related.

release.feature: Added support the Android 4.3 API.
Added support for custom Application classes.
Added support for Visual Studio 2013 preview.
Added support for struct behavior.
Added support WCF JSON services (client).
release.problem: Could not set breakpoint in delegate.
Error removing breakpoints in Visual Studio.
Cast error in Visual Studio 2012 XML Editor.
MetaDataAttribute.Resource property has wrong type.
Various unsigned short/byte errors.
Various verify and compilation errors.
Imported java methods with generic parameters fail.
Rare typing error in code of imported java methods.
release.change: System.Object.Wait methods renamed to JavaWait.
All C# types now implement java.lang.Cloneable to support MemberwiseClone().
Significant compiler performance improvement.
Various framework types/methods have been added.

release.feature: Import jar now preserves annotations when possible.
Various .NET framework enhancements.
release.change: Import jar references has been greatly improved. Access to members is now much closer to what is meant in java and name conflicts are handled a lot safer.
Lots and lots of compiler issues have been fixed. Both errors during compilation and runtime (verify) errors.
Compilation performance of large methods has been greatly improved.
License agreement must now be accepted during activation.
release.problem: Various debugger improvements.
Various SharpDevelop issues.

release.feature: Added SharpDevelop support.
Added WCF client support for REST/XML services.
release.problem: Various casting problems.
Various import jar problems.
Various enum conversion problems.
release.change: Setup warns when no valid Visual Studio version is detected.
Enum types are now implemented are object instances (like in Java) instead of a primitive types (like in .NET). This is done to keep them explicit and avoid overload conflicts.
Code signing certificate of dot42 binaries has changed.
Improved usability of Device Center.
release.feature: Many .NET framework members added.
release.problem: TearDown attribute not supported for NUnit tests.
Nullable enum types cause verification error.
Java classes using Type<Void> signatures fail to compile when imported in C#.
Various minor compile issues.

release.feature: Added support for jar files containing code (not only stubs).
Added Android support library assemblies, added Support4Demos sample showing it's use.
Improved framework support (added few types, improves many base types).
Improved manifest attributes (provider, service).
Improved APK Spy wrt. code inspection.
release.change: Target SDK version is not specified in the Visual Studio (MSBuild) project, no longer in an assembly attribute.
Android framework interfaces that already start with an 'I' are no longer prefixed with an additional 'I' (e.g. IBinder instead of IIBinder).
release.problem: Adb install task did not report all possible installation errors.
Enum types with underlying type other than int causes verify error.
Many small compiler issues.

release.feature: Added SimpleGps sample showing how to query the location service for the current location and speed.
Added support for specifying the targetSdkVersion. This enables you to use the modern HOLO theme on your applications even if you target 2.x android versions.
release.change: Reachable detection phase of compiler has been changed. Public types that are not marked with an ApplicationRoot attribute (or derived attribute) are no longer included as root of the application.
release.problem: Verify error in rare cases.

release.feature: Added AirportInfo sample showing how to fetch data from a JSON webservice.
Abstract interface implementation methods in the Android framework can now be overriden.
Primitive number types now implement IFormattable.
Variable argument methods in the Android framework now have a "params" parameter.
release.problem: Including layout files in a Visual Studio project does not always set the build type.
Convert.ToInt64 fails
Convert.ToBase64String fails
Method with generic out parameter may fail when called with primitive or enum value.
Extension methods on primitive types may cause verify errors.
Cast problem with UInt32 constants.
release.change: String.Format improved.

release.feature: Added Camera sample.
Added Simple HttpServer sample.
Added update check to Visual Studio plugin.
release.change: Sign converted method (sbyte parameters to byte parameters) have been removed from interfaces.
release.problem: IntentFilter manifest support fails.

release.feature: Modify target version of project depending on your device's Android version.
Added OpenGL and R.Layout.Simple_item_list1 samples.
Added support for "supports-screens" element in Android manifest.
release.change: "static readonly string" constants in the Android API are now available as "const string".
Changed debugger attachment process.
release.problem: '.' in resource ID breaks compilation of R.cs.
Missing resources.arsc due to MSBuild 'optimization'.

release.feature: Improved exception debugging support
Added process specific device log in Visual Studio (Debug - Windows - Device log)
release.problem: Resource error do to show in the Visual Studio error window
Debugger does not detect stopped app on device
release.change: Changed debugger attachment process.
Device log shows Main log instead of System log.

release.feature: Added support for Free Apps Keys.
Added (optional) DOT42_AVD_HOME environment variable to set the location of emulator images.
release.problem: VS2012 crash after closing a debugging session.
release.change: Various framework fixes/improvements.
release.problem: Install APK via Device Center can cause crash when installation fails.

release.feature: Added support for Linq (Enumerable) methods on IIterable<T> arguments.
Added driver information for Alcatel Onetouch devices to Device connection wizard.
Added "Publish app in Google Play" button to Device Center.
release.change: User account is now shown in Device Center even if your license is not yet activated.
release.problem: Menu designer causes crash or error message box in VS2012.

release.feature: Improved support for System.Text
Improved support for System.Xml.Linq
release.change: Improved logging when deploying apps to a device.
Improved API documentation.
Change framework in dot42 Assembly Checkers points to root of frameworks folder.
Various exception types in the .NET API are not mapped directly onto corresponding exceptions in the Android API.
release.problem: Several minor fixes in the compiler.
Using custom styles with upper-case letters failed.

release.change: Boxed types such as java.lang.Boolean were incorrectly converted as bool. Now they are bool?.
Apps created with community license always get a "(by dot42.com)" postfix in their application name.
release.problem: In rare case xor operations did not compile correctly.
release.feature: Adding support for System.Xml.Linq
Added byref/out parameter support
Improved Assembly checker
release.change: Improved code generator

release.feature: Debug support added
